title: InsightExtractionReport
description: A comprehensive report extracting summaries, ideas, insights, quotes, habits, facts, references, recommendations, and takeaways from input content, with strict formatting and quantity requirements.

summary.description: A 25-word summary of the content, including who is presenting and the main topics discussed.

ideas.description: A list of 20-50 surprising, insightful, and interesting ideas. Each bullet must be exactly 16 words. Extract at least 25.

items.description: A surprising, insightful, or interesting idea from the input, exactly 16 words.

insights.description: A list of 10-20 refined, abstracted, and insightful observations based on the ideas and content. Each bullet is exactly 16 words.

items.description: A highly refined and insightful observation, exactly 16 words.

quotes.description: A list of 15-30 surprising, insightful, or interesting direct quotes from the content. Each quote ends with the speaker's name.

items.description: An exact quote from the input, ending with the name of the speaker.

habits.description: A list of 15-30 practical and useful personal habits mentioned or modeled by speakers. Each bullet is exactly 16 words.

items.description: A practical personal habit, exactly 16 words.

facts.description: A list of 15-30 surprising, insightful, or interesting valid facts about the world mentioned in the content. Each bullet is exactly 16 words.

items.description: A valid fact about the world, exactly 16 words.

references.description: A list of all mentions of writing, art, tools, projects, or other sources of inspiration cited by speakers.

items.description: A reference mentioned by the speaker.

one_sentence_takeaway.description: A single, potent, 15-word sentence capturing the most important essence and recommendation from the content.

recommendations.description: A list of 15-30 surprising, insightful, or interesting recommendations, each exactly 16 words.

items.description: A recommendation distilled from the content, exactly 16 words.
